pages.text: The microscope is an invaluable tool for researching specimens.$(br2)Place a bee in the top right slot to begin analyzing it - you'll be presented with a minigame you'll have to complete.

pages.title: Microscope
pages.text: $(o)Which end do I look through?$(br2)$()The difficulty of the minigame is based on how complex the species is: the further into the mutation tree, the more complex a species.

To help you complete the minigame, you can place additional drones or princesses into the slots below the specimen. These bees are then consumed to provide hints towards the game - the more complex a specimen, the more bees it takes to get a hint.

Once you complete the minigame, you'll $(l)research$() a random mutation involving the specimen's primary species. Researching a mutation grants apiaries placed by you a flat +20% chance for the mutation to occur within them.
